questList.questDescription: The Ethereal Wraithstalker, Shadowveil Grimlurker, wanders lost in the woods, torn between light and darkness. Will you bring peace or vanquish this spectral being?
Create an alliance with Galeshriek Skyrender, the Harbinger of Avian Fury, to tame the chaotic forces of the woods and restore balance.
Defeat the Mystic Planes Weaver, Vortexdream Warpbringer, to claim an amulet of alliance in defiance of the Ethereal Woods' enchantments.
Navigate the icy alliances in Frostbite Canyon. Decide whether to reconcile or eliminate the chilling beings like Frostveil Echoseeker to progress.
Convince the Frostbound Serpent Guardian, Glacialcoil Frostwarder, to aid you with healing melodies against the frosty dangers.
Destroy the Luminescent Crystal Weaver, Frostgaze Prismord, to earn an amulet of alliance and cleanse the canyon of cold menace.
Only by defeating Gloomspire Shadebearer, the Spectral Soulhunter, can you claim victory and advance past the Shadowed Catacombs.
Forging an alliance with Nightveil Tombwarden, the Shadowed Guardian Sentinel, will grant you an amulet of healing amidst the whispering shadows.
End the schemes of Hollowshade Omenseer, the Ethereal Spectral Prophet, to receive an amulet of alliance and dispel the darkness that lurks.
